channel.title: Watch Dogs vs Sleeping Dogs
channel.description: So are those two titles referring to the same game or are those 2 different games and the publishers want to confuse us again?

item.title: Watch Dogs vs Sleeping Dogs
item.dc:creator: Maxx_Skywalker
item.description:
I was making that connection between True Crime and Sleeping Dogs. I just wasn’t sure if that was actually the case. Good news, though, because I was looking forward to it before it was announced that the project was canned.

Read full topic

item.title: Watch Dogs vs Sleeping Dogs
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
Sleeping Dogs is basically True Crime: HongKong that was scraped long time ago and pick up by another publisher. They change the name to Sleeping Dogs is because the original publisher have the copyright on the original name.

The reason why they call it Sleeping Dogs is also based on 80s Hong Kong crime movie.

Read full topic

item.title: Watch Dogs vs Sleeping Dogs
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Watch Dogs is actually a more relevant title to the context of the game than Sleeping Dogs is to itself but anyone who does a minimum amount of research will quickly learn the difference between the two.

Read full topic

item.description:
not at all, it’s just freaking me out that actually 2 games with almost the same name will be released.
wtf was their thought process when creating the name of watch dogs?!
